title: Denise
text: Setting up the insurance was great with Denise but the rating of insurance should be once you MUST use it.  If it performs and covers you as you expected - if so, then you will get a 5 star rating!  Hard to rate when we are using it or hope not to.

title: have used AARDY in past
text: have used AARDY in past; Satisfied;This time, the link to "MyAccount" was expired, it took me 13min, vrs the tokens 10min !   I would suggest they allow more time, or use a website that allows other type login's;  Nonetheless, I would use them again.

title: Had online chat help to determine best…
text: Had online chat help to determine best rate and policy. Very efficient and satisfied with results of selection

title: Easy to find the best policy for my…
text: Easy to find the best policy for my trip. I like the compare feature. I didn't like the too frequent email reminders to choose a policy.

title: …Best price for the service
text: For what you are covered for the price cannot be beat.  Was understandable, clear in what was provided and again great price.

title: I won’t know how positive this company…
text: I won’t know how positive this company is until I actually travel with them. It seemed to go well with applying process.

title: It was quite easy to get quotes
text: It was quite easy to get quotes. You could select what you wanted and compare and if you have questions they have a chat that will answer them for you . So as far as getting insurance it was simple.

title: Easy to experience
text: The website is excellent, as always. For this trip I had questions and so used chat. All my questions were answered. I love the ability to download the transcript. I purchased the recommended policy.Purchasing a good policy is the easy part, I have never had a claim on a policy. The testament would be how you handle a legitimate claim. I only hear nightmares about help and reimbursements.

title: Easy to use and convenient
text: Easy to use and convenient

title: Web site didn't work well
text: Web site didn't work well. The person a spoke to on the phone was very helpful (Denise)

title: It was easy
text: Christina J and Felicia F Customer Service managers were really helpful and patient with me.  They made the process of understanding and purchasing travel insurance.

title: Best coverage for the money
text: Best coverage for the money, easy to understand and simple application process.

title: Great quotes
text: I was happy to find a company where I could receive quotes from all the major companies to view different rates for travel insurance.   It was an easy process for me and a great price.   So far so good.

title: Good way to compare policies and rates
text: Good way to compare policies and rates.  All of the policies are quite detailed and you have to look carefully at the specifics and exclusions and AARDY seems to simplify the process a bit.

title: Agents were friendly, but missed an important detail
text: Agents were responsive and friendly; I gave minus one star since when I finally decided to purchase from them and sent exact details of my flight and cruise; I noticed my coverage starts on the day of my cruise, vs. my flight which leaves a day prior.  They did correct after 24 hours; but still having to wait for them to correct and respond and not double-check my trip details, before finalizing the policy, was a bit frustrating.

title: Excellent Site - Minor Tweak Recommended
text: Easy to use. Information provided in plain language. Have used many times before. This time I noticed some new insurance companies whose names and reputations I did not recognize nor have familiarity. Would be great help to make customers aware of new insurance companies and their reputations when they become part of Aardy's stable.

title: Insurance for international travel.
text: I wanted an insurance for an upcoming international trip of mine. I looked around on the internet and came across AARDY. I believe they gave the best deal, so I signed with them.

title: Agent was great, but Aardy's IT system was poor.
text: The agent, Destiny, was great.  I give her 5 stars.The reason that I gave the experience 4 stars is due to Aardy's system.  The dates that were entered into the system - departure, return, date of first payment - were all correct.  However, when the policy was issued, all 3 dates were change by one day. Your  system has a real problem.  Destiny then had to send an email to IMG to issue a corrected policy.

title: It was easy to compare the various…
text: It was easy to compare the various choices. Friends have utilized this so I was trusting.Unfortunately, I only saw policies where one can cancel for medical reasons. There are MANY other reasons for cancellation that I'd like to see covered.

title: Customer Service…
text: Both the Customer Service Representatives I spoke to (Amanda and Silvia)were courteous and helpful and most importantly knowledgeable. The only reason I did not give a 5 star rating is I was not informed of one of the deadlines to be included in my policy which was really important to my trip. Hopefully, it will not be needed.

title: AIG Travel Insurance
text: Good insurance that gives us peace of mind.  Unfortunately, all such insurance policies have gone up in cost.  It makes it almost not affordable for retired couples with limited means, however the Standard AIG policy was less expensive than many others and offered reasonably good coverage.  Destiny, the Agent, was very knowledgeable, friendly and helpful.

title: Good information and support
text: Good information and support.  I can't speak to anything further unless I have to use it.  Then, I can speak to the insurance company and how well they perform based on what I have been told.

title: My representative was amazing.I believe…
text: This is definitely a 5 Star Review !  My representative is amazing. She is patient, easy to understand, and fluent in trip insurance detail. She happily guided me until I understood what to buy (I'm a first timer).                      I believe her name is Melanie. (starts with a "M")Thank you

title: I found their process for selecting a…
text: I found their process for selecting a travel insurance policy easier than some other sites I've used. I knew something about the companies listed for earlier research, so I trusted the recommended policies. I haven't needed to file a claim, so I can't comment on the company I selected.

title: Great experience shopping for travel…
text: Great experience shopping for travel insurance. What would make things better for my family is to be able to specify the  coverage we desire. For example I do not need reimbursement for cost of trip. What is critical is coverage for evacuation and medical costs in foreign country. Thank you!Collette

title: Overall seems like good options but difficulty with payment
text: Overall seems like good options were offered. Unless I actually need to use the insurance, it will be impossible to tell how good of an option it is. I struggled multiple times with error messages when trying to buy and pay for the plan. Finally, payment went through.

title: The many options I was given to choose…
text: The many options I was given to choose from after entering my information. The only glitch was that I had to reenter all my information at least 4 times because I kept getting a response saying invalid trip cost. I had a period at the end of the number that was not allowed apparently which would have been nice to know when entering the figure.

title: Quick, no frills
text: This only took 10 minutes at most. The agent was professional and courteous.

title: Agents plus finding the policy.
text: Always someone to talk to if any questions about the quote. They spoke my language and were very knowledgeable about the insurance options.Regarding finding the actual policy to review - the light blue very small font was not helpful.

title: Shauna
text: Shauna, the phone rep was very helpful and informative.  She answered all my questions and concerns.

title: I was looking for travel insurance as I was visiting USA
text: Since I'm traveling to the USA, I was browsing for travel insurance. As an Indian national, I was unable to afford a significant sum due to the low value of Indian rupees relative to the US dollar. The fact that AARDY had one of the most affordable premiums of any insurance I could find.Regards, AARDY

title: Easy to purchase but uncertain just…
text: Easy to purchase but uncertain just what you are getting unless you actually use it. Fortunately for me, my brother actually had to use Trawick purchased here after many trips and they did properly stand by their protection.

title: Melanie took time to explain things to…
text: Melanie took time to explain things to me. I felt reassured by her knowledge that in the very unlikely even I had a claim she would be there to explain things to me. Your policy summaries I found very lacking. Melanie had to take time to fill in what had a 3 hour delay minimum, what had a 12 hour, if dental was included etc.

title: Melanie was a great rep
text: Melanie was a great rep, however the phone system was terrible.  On my return all, the call could not be transferred to Melanie.  Easy fix, and an unacceptable issue for customer.

title: Great Policy Selection and Information
text: The website is very helpful, because it offers a variety of policies from several insurance companies. My reading of policies left me with questions, but I was able to call an AARDY representative who had lots of information, and clarification. She helped me choose the right policy for our overseas trip.      I

title: While I find the representatives very…
text: While I find the representatives very nice. I first called about only Medical travel insurance and was quoted prices adding all these extras, not just Medical travel. So the price was 12x’s what I expected. I had to really explore with the representatives to get it down to what I really wanted. Maybe start with the travel insurance and add policies.

title: Positive experience with AARDY
text: I haven’t heard of AARDY Insurance before so I was skeptical at first but after talking to Peter I felt more comfortable. Peter was so helpful, very professional and  he was so thorough in answering my questions and explaining the coverage in detail. Because of these , I give 5 stars. ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Waiting on a promised call back.
text: Dropped to 4 stars due to on line chat promising a phone call back the next day at a specific time which never happened. Was able to answer my own questions researching quote and insurance documents.But having used AARDY on several other trips in the past with immediate and positive results on having to cancel travel for one trip and change details on another, purchased the recommended coverage anyway.

title: Cost of trip changes
text: Original trip cost couldn’t be corrected, so had to submit multiple requests.

title: Left hand and Right hand had different answers
text: Agent on chat said there were no options for the policy I was considering ... but when I allowed a call to be made to me,  it was said not to be the case.  I knew this because I had researched the policy extensively before I attempted to purchase the policy

title: Felicia was my agent
text: Felicia was my agent,   very patientand so informative with info on plans offeredA very helpful knowledgeable Agent!

title: Made it easy to choose the best policy…
text: Made it easy to choose the best policy for my circumstances

title: It was easy and very explanatory
text: It was easy and very explanatory.  The question I did have was answered right away when I called the customer service number.When I purchased the policy, I was surprised that the program created a picture of my credit card as I typed in the number.  I'm hoping that the graphic of my card does not stay within the system as that made me nervous.

title: The representative was very helpful…
text: The representative was very helpful over the phone and pleasant. Having said that, she did need to ascertain responses to questions I had, but did respond the next day.

title: Customer service agents Maranda and…
text: Customer service agents Maranda and Shana were both helpful and professional.  I was surprised how quick and simple the process to sign up for travel insurance was.

title: I prefer the website of…
text: I prefer the website of InsureMyTrip.com, on which one can compare various policies and their different coverages in different areas all on one screen.Having said so, this was an easy site to navigate and purchase to make.

title: Great and professional service
text: Great and professional service. Very helpful person at the other end of the line. My suggestion to improve the coverage for travelers is to have the choice of prolong your coverage at a later date if you happen to want to extend to stay in a foreign country for another month or two and not having to go thru the entire new application for a new policy.

title: Nice idea but the Compare Feature is lacking.
text: It’s nice to see several travel insurance companies at one time. I wish the compare feature was a bit more robust, comparing each company by category rather than having to look at each separately.

title: I spoke with Melanie who was very…
text: I spoke with Melanie who was very patient and informative. This insurance stuff is so complicated, but she was very sweet and friendly. I found this site thru my AARP. I would definitely recommend you give a try.

title: Serenity was very pleasant
text: Serenity was very pleasant, patient and kind in her assistance in explaining to me the available plans.  She has a good personality and I appreciate her customer service.  The process did not take a long time to complete.

title: Destiny was professional
text: Destiny was professional, knowledgeable and very pleasant!  However, though I was told that I would receive the insurance materials within two hours, two days later I had not.  I emailed, and received most but not all of the materials.  I emailed again and received the insurance policy.  Unfortunately, the excellent experience with the agent was marred by the poor follow-through.

title: Customer Service Agent was helpful
text: Customer Service Agent was helpful, polite, and professional.  She thoroughly explained the benefits of the policy I purchased for my wife and I.

title: My overall experience was excellent, but be sure to check for the accuracy of your information before confirming the purchase.
text: My overall experience was excellent and Lyle was very knowledgeable and patient.  He explained things very well and answered all my questions..  However, when I opened the trip confirmation e-mail after the transaction was complete and I had hung up, I saw that Lyle had the wrong dates for one of my policies.  I then had to call back because the policy purchase had been completed.  Another associate assisted me, but now I need to wait two weeks for an amended policy, keep checking to be sure it arrives, and pay more because the incorrect dates were for a shorter cruise.  This may seem like a small thing, but it is one more item to add to my To Do list and a waste of my time.

title: Very happy so far…
text: Finding the right trip insurance can be a daunting task, especially for seniors making an international trip during the era of Covid.  How much is too much, or not enough? What’s actually covered and what isn’t? AARDY helped demystify all this with good recommendations and coverage comparisons, and when I had a question and called customer service, the response I received was both prompt and helpful. We haven’t taken our trip yet, so I have no experience with making an actual claim, which as with all insurance will hopefully be unnecessary. It’s also the reason for a four-star rather than five-star review. As of now, however, we feel we’ve made a good choice for good coverage with a reputable and responsible company at a fair price.
